author: bencomic

left.text: John Jr... otherwise known as John Kevin Perkins Junior? I am an IRCOP. What is going on here is illegal in 26 states.

right.text: Skullie you know that Wisconsin isn't covered under the fourteenth bylaw of the Net Neutrality Charter.

title: THE BALLAD OF JOHN JR: Part 39
